snippet: Janet L. Yellen, the president’s nominee to lead the Federal Reserve, made investors confident that the central bank would stick with policies that have sent shares soaring.
abstract: Testimony from Janet L Yellen, nominee to lead the Federal Reserve, is met warmly by stock brokers worldwide, raising confidence that she will stick with stimulus policies that have sent shares soaring; Yellen testifies that she does not believe stimulus has created a bubble.
lead_paragraph: Janet L. Yellen, the president’s nominee to lead the Federal Reserve, made investors confident that the central bank would stick with policies that have sent shares soaring.

headline.main: Message From Yellen Is Full Speed Ahead on the Stimulus
headline.print_headline:
Focus Is on Economy
At Yellen Hearing: Full Speed Ahead Is Message on the Stimulus
